verses.text: And this \add is\add* the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* that thou shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto them to \w hallow|strong="H6942"\w* them, to minister unto me in the \w priest’s office|strong="H3547"\w*: \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*,

And \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, and \w cakes|strong="H2471"\w* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w tempered|strong="H1101"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and \w wafers|strong="H7550"\w* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*: \add of\add* \w wheaten|strong="H2406"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* shalt thou \w make|strong="H6213"\w* them.

And thou shalt \w put|strong="H5414"\w* them into \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w basket|strong="H5536"\w*, and \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* them in the \w basket|strong="H5536"\w*, with the \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* and the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*.

And \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* unto the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, and shalt \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* them with \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

And thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w put|strong="H3847"\w* upon \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* the \w coat|strong="H3801"\w*, and the \w robe|strong="H4598"\w* of the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*, and the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*, and the \w breastplate|strong="H2833"\w*, and \w gird|strong="H0640"\w* him with the curious \w girdle|strong="H2805"\w* of the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*:

And thou shalt \w put|strong="H7760"\w* the \w mitre|strong="H4701"\w* upon his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w crown|strong="H5145"\w* upon the \w mitre|strong="H4701"\w*.

Then shalt thou \w take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and \w pour|strong="H3332"\w* \add it\add* upon his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* him.
And thou shalt \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w put|strong="H3847"\w* \w coats|strong="H3801"\w* upon them.

And thou shalt \w gird|strong="H2296"\w* them with \w girdles|strong="H0073"\w*, \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w put|strong="H2280"\w* the \w bonnets|strong="H4021"\w* on them: and the \w priest’s office|strong="H3550"\w* shall be theirs for a \w perpetual|strong="H5769"\w* \w statute|strong="H2708"\w*: and thou shalt \w consecrate|strong="H4390"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*.\f + \fr 29.9 \ft put: Heb. bind\f*\f + \fr 29.9 \ft consecrate: Heb. fill the hand of\f*

And thou shalt cause a \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* to be \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*: and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* shall \w put|strong="H5564"\w* their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* upon the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*.

And thou shalt \w kill|strong="H7819"\w* the \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add by\add* the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*.

And thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* upon the \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* with thy \w finger|strong="H0676"\w*, and \w pour|strong="H8210"\w* all the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w beside|strong="H0413"\w* the \w bottom|strong="H3247"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

And thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* all the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* that \w covereth|strong="H3680"\w* the \w inwards|strong="H7130"\w*, and the \w caul|strong="H3508"\w* \add that is\add* above the \w liver|strong="H3516"\w*, and the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w kidneys|strong="H3629"\w*, and the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* that \add is\add* upon them, and \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \add them\add* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.\f + \fr 29.13 \ft the caul: it seemeth by anatomy, and the Hebrew doctors, to be the midriff\f*

But the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of the \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, and his \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, and his \w dung|strong="H6569"\w*, shalt thou \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*: it \add is\add* a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*.

¶ Thou shalt also \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*; and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* shall \w put|strong="H5564"\w* their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* upon the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*.

And thou shalt \w slay|strong="H7819"\w* the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, and thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* his \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and \w sprinkle|strong="H2236"\w* \add it\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

And thou shalt \w cut|strong="H5408"\w* the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* in \w pieces|strong="H5409"\w*, and \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* the \w inwards|strong="H7130"\w* of him, and his \w legs|strong="H3767"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add them\add* unto his \w pieces|strong="H5409"\w*, and unto his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.\f + \fr 29.17 \ft unto: or, upon\f*

And thou shalt \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* the whole \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*: it \add is\add* a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: it \add is\add* a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w*, an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

¶ And thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*; and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* shall \w put|strong="H5564"\w* their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* upon the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*.

Then shalt thou \w kill|strong="H7819"\w* the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, and \w take|strong="H3947"\w* of his \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* upon the \w tip|strong="H8571"\w* of the right \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and upon the \w tip|strong="H8571"\w* of the \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* of his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and upon the \w thumb|strong="H0931"\w* of their \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and upon the great \w toe|strong="H0931"\w* of their \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w*, and \w sprinkle|strong="H2236"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

And thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* that \add is\add* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and of the \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and \w sprinkle|strong="H5137"\w* \add it\add* upon \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and upon his \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, and upon his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and upon the \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* of his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* with him: and he shall be \w hallowed|strong="H6942"\w*, and his \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and his \w sons’|strong="H1121"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* with him.

Also thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* of the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* and the \w rump|strong="H0451"\w*, and the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* that \w covereth|strong="H3680"\w* the \w inwards|strong="H7130"\w*, and the \w caul|strong="H3508"\w* \add above\add* the \w liver|strong="H3516"\w*, and the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w kidneys|strong="H3629"\w*, and the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* that \add is\add* upon them, and the \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H7785"\w*; for it \add is\add* a \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* of \w consecration|strong="H4394"\w*:

And \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w loaf|strong="H3603"\w* of \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w cake|strong="H2471"\w* of \w oiled|strong="H8081"\w* bread, and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w wafer|strong="H7550"\w* out of the \w basket|strong="H5536"\w* of the unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w* that \add is\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:

And thou shalt \w put|strong="H7760"\w* all in the \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and in the \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* of his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*; and shalt \w wave|strong="H5130"\w* them \add for\add* a wave \w offering|strong="H8573"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 29.24 \ft shalt wave: or, shalt shake to and fro\f*

And thou shalt \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* them of their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \add them\add* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* for a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, for a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: it \add is\add* an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w breast|strong="H2373"\w* of the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* of \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* \w consecration|strong="H4394"\w*, and \w wave|strong="H5130"\w* it \add for\add* a wave \w offering|strong="H8573"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and it shall be thy \w part|strong="H4490"\w*.

And thou shalt \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* the \w breast|strong="H2373"\w* of the wave \w offering|strong="H8573"\w*, and the \w shoulder|strong="H7785"\w* of the heave \w offering|strong="H8641"\w*, which is \w waved|strong="H5130"\w*, and which is heaved \w up|strong="H7311"\w*, of the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* of the \w consecration|strong="H4394"\w*, \add even\add* of \add that\add* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \add is\add* for \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and of \add that\add* which is for his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*:

And it shall be \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons’|strong="H1121"\w* by a \w statute|strong="H2706"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* from the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: for it \add is\add* an heave \w offering|strong="H8641"\w*: and it shall be an heave \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* from the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* of the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of their peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, \add even\add* their heave \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ And the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* shall be his \w sons’|strong="H1121"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him, to be \w anointed|strong="H4888"\w* therein, and to be \w consecrated|strong="H4390"\w* in them.

\add And\add* that \w son|strong="H1121"\w* that is \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* in his stead shall \w put|strong="H3847"\w* them on \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, when he \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w* to \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* in the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add*.\f + \fr 29.30 \ft that son: Heb. he of his sons\f*

¶ And thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* of the \w consecration|strong="H4394"\w*, and \w seethe|strong="H1310"\w* his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* in the \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

And \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, and the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* that \add is\add* in the \w basket|strong="H5536"\w*, \add by\add* the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*.

And they shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* those things wherewith the atonement was \w made|strong="H3722"\w*, to \w consecrate|strong="H4390"\w* \add and\add* to \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* them: but a \w stranger|strong="H2114"\w* shall not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \add thereof\add*, because they \add are\add* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*.

And if ought of the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of the \w consecrations|strong="H4394"\w*, or of the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \w remain|strong="H3498"\w* unto the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, then thou shalt \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* the \w remainder|strong="H3498"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: it shall not be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*, because it \add is\add* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*.

And thus shalt thou \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and to his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, according to all \add things\add* which I have \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee: \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shalt thou \w consecrate|strong="H4390"\w* them.

And thou shalt \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* every \w day|strong="H3117"\w* a \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* \add for\add* a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* for \w atonement|strong="H3725"\w*: and thou shalt \w cleanse|strong="H2398"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, when thou hast made an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for it, and thou shalt \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* it, to \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* it.

\w Seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* thou shalt make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* it; and it shall be an \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* most \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*: whatsoever \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* shall be \w holy|strong="H6942"\w*.

¶ Now this \add is that\add* which thou shalt \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*; \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* by \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*.

The \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* thou shalt \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*; and the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* thou shalt \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* at \w even|strong="H6153"\w*:

And with the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* a \w tenth|strong="H6241"\w* deal of \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with the fourth \w part|strong="H7253"\w* of an \w hin|strong="H1969"\w* of \w beaten|strong="H3795"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*; and the fourth \w part|strong="H7243"\w* of an \w hin|strong="H1969"\w* of \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \add for\add* a drink \w offering|strong="H5262"\w*.

And the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* thou shalt \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* at \w even|strong="H6153"\w*, and shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* thereto according to the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* of the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and according to the drink \w offering|strong="H5262"\w* thereof, for a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w*, an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

\add This shall be\add* a \w continual|strong="H8548"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* throughout your \w generations|strong="H1755"\w* \add at\add* the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: where I will \w meet|strong="H3259"\w* you, to \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* there unto thee.

And there I will \w meet|strong="H3259"\w* with the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \add the tabernacle\add* shall be \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* by my \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*.\f + \fr 29.43 \ft the tabernacle: or, Israel\f*

And I will \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, and the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*: I will \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* also both \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, to minister to me in the \w priest’s office|strong="H3547"\w*.
¶ And I will \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and will be their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And they shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, that brought them \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, that I may \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* them: I \add am\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
